casebody.data:
Cincinnati Bar Association v. Haas.

[Cite as Cincinnati Bar Assn. v. Haas (2000), 88 Ohio St.3d 1228.]

(No. 98-378 Submitted and decided January 12, 2000.)

For earlier case, see Cincinnati Bar Assn. v. Haas (1998), 84 Ohio St.3d 85, 702 N.E.2d 59.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
